Module nl.meron.yaeger
Package nl.meron.yaeger.engine.entities.entity

Interface SceneBorderCrossingWatcher

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Bounded, DimensionsProvider, NodeProvider, SceneChild
    public interface SceneBorderCrossingWatcher
extends Bounded, SceneChild
    Implement this interface to be notified if the Entity crosses the boundary of the YaegerScene. In that case, the method notifyBoundaryCrossing(SceneBorder) will be called.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void notifyBoundaryCrossing​(SceneBorder border)
      This method is being called when this SceneBorderCrossingWatcher crosses a border of the YaegerScene.
      default Updatable watchForBoundaryCrossing()  

      • Methods inherited from interface nl.meron.yaeger.engine.entities.entity.Bounded

        getBottomY, getCenterX, getCenterY, getHeight, getLeftX, getNonTransformedBounds, getRightX, getTopY, getTransformedBounds, getWidth

      • Methods inherited from interface nl.meron.yaeger.engine.entities.entity.NodeProvider

        getGameNode, toBack, toFront

      • Methods inherited from interface nl.meron.yaeger.engine.entities.entity.SceneChild

        getSceneHeight, getSceneWidth

    • Method Detail

      • notifyBoundaryCrossing

        void notifyBoundaryCrossing​(SceneBorder border)
        This method is being called when this SceneBorderCrossingWatcher crosses a border of the YaegerScene.
        Parameters:
        border - The border of the YaegerScene the Entity is crossing.

      • watchForBoundaryCrossing

        default Updatable watchForBoundaryCrossing()
